description: Disassociates an Identity and Access Management (IAM) role from a DB cluster.

parameters.name: DBClusterIdentifier
parameters.description: The name of the DB cluster to disassociate the IAM role from.

parameters.name: RoleArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role to disassociate from the DB cluster, for example arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/NeptuneAccessRole.
